member.name: T:Midi_IO.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Midi_IO.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Midi_IO.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: E:Midi_IO.Midi_IO.MidiInCallbackMsg
member.summary: messages about the state of a Midi-In Port

member.name: E:Midi_IO.Midi_IO.MidiOutCallbackMsg
member.summary: messages about the state of a Midi-Out Port

member.name: E:Midi_IO.Midi_IO.MidiInLongdata
member.summary: Handles the MIM_LONGDATA message in a modified manner. lpMidiHdr in dwParam1 is copied to a managed buffer as byte()

member.name: P:Midi_IO.Midi_IO.MidiIn_filter_TimingClock
member.summary: Set to FALSE to receive TimingClock

member.name: P:Midi_IO.Midi_IO.MidiIn_filter_ActiveSense
member.summary: Set to FALSE to receive ActiveSense

member.name: M:Midi_IO.Midi_IO._Start
member.summary: start the Midi_IO system Returns FALSE if already started

member.name: M:Midi_IO.Midi_IO._End
member.summary: stop the Midi_IO system. Returns FALSE if already stopped

member.name: M:Midi_IO.Midi_IO.RefreshPortList
member.summary: Closes all In- and Output Ports. Updates the list of In- and Output Ports. Useful if a device was connected or disconnected
